title: Dominate
description: If you liked Outlander you will like this story!  After escaping the arena, Jessie and the intimidating gladiator, Magnus Maximus, are on the run for their lives. Not only does Jessie have to manage her new relationship with the gladiator, but she also has to worry about the many armed guards chasing them through the streets of ancient Rome, as well as the wrath of the intimidating, yet seductive, Emperor Demetrius.  Will Jessie's unusual relationship with the brute gladiator work out? And will Jessie be able to use her knowledge to overthrow the Empire?  This is the second instalment of The Gladiator's Girl series, which includes: Conquer (The Gladiator's Girl #1) Dominate (The Gladiator's Girl #2) Prevail (The Gladiator's Girl #3)   This 9k erotic romance includes steamy sexual encounters. Adult readers only!  keywords: short romance, erotic romance, historical romance, ancient world, ancient Rome
author: Violette Paradise
